t: Yuxiang shredded pork - Wikipedia

This seasoning has nothing to do with fish, instead imitating the ...

t: Yuxiang - Wikipedia
s: December 21, 2024 - Yuxiang (simplified Chinese: 鱼香; traditional Chinese: 魚香; pinyin: yúxiāng; lit.
